code: export var selectSong=function selectSong(song){return{type:"SONG_SELECTED",payload:song};};export var selectSongById=function selectSongById(id){return{type:"SONG_SELECTED_BY_ID",payload:id};};export var setPlayerState=function setPlayerState(val){return{type:"PLAYER_STATE_SELECTED",payload:val};};export var setVolume=function setVolume(val){return{type:"SET_VOLUME",payload:val};};export var setDuration=function setDuration(val){return{type:"SET_DURATION",payload:val};};export var setCurrentLocation=function setCurrentLocation(val){return{type:"SET_CURRENT_LOCATION",payload:val};};
